name: For two thousand twenty
description:
This Artwork was created in 2019 before the Wuhan pandemic spread.
At that time I didn't know anything, while I was still half asleep during the day suddenly a shadow like this picture appeared, I immediately woke up and immediately enthusiastically sketched on paper randomly, then I started painting it on the jacket, after a few days I made it into digital form.
When the pandemic spread in wuhan I thought it was normal and would not reach my country, but after weeks of following the news and I also knew that the pandemic would threaten the world, there I was shocked and then linked this image which somehow suddenly appeared in my imagination while I was half asleep.
That's why I named it two thousand and twenty because that year the pandemic began to spread to all corners of the earth.
